resources.string: This app exports all contacts to the SD card. Please select a directory, where to store the contacts.

The contacts will now be exported into that directory automatically whenever they change. You will get a notification after each export, so that you know the application is still running in the background. You wonâ€™t need to open this application ever again, the exports will still happen, even if the phone is restarted.
Contacts were successfully exported and stored.
Tap to grant the required permissions.
This app only works when accessing the contacts is permitted. You permanently denied the access, please go to the settings and grant the permission to the contacts there.
This app only works when accessing the contacts is permitted. Please grant access to contacts.

This app runs in the background. By default, apps that are not manually started (like this one) are automatically stopped after a few months. To prevent that, disable in the settings under the \"Unused apps\" section the \"Remove permissions and free up space\" setting.

This app runs in the background. By default apps that are not actively used will have their granted permissions automatically removed after a few months. To prevent that, disable under \"Permissions\" the \"Remove permissions if app isn\'t used\" setting.
